example.description: A panel is an element that defines a section within a statusbar.
example.source: <a:window width="500" height="100" visible="true" icon="application.png" title="Statusbar" resizable="true" minwidth="300"> <a:statusbar> <a:section icon="application.png">Ajax.org</a:section> <a:section>Some status information</a:section> <a:section> <a:progressbar anchors="6 5 5 5" autostart="true" /> </a:section> </a:statusbar> </a:window>
